pages.title: Power Sources
pages.text: $(bold)Unlocking Potential$()$(br2)Control-compatible power sources (jets, propellers) apply force, not acceleration. Mass changes require constant tuning. Redstone control is non-intuitive (min/max mappings).
These sources were designed for CC integration. CC programs can easily read mass and adjust thrust dynamically. With 4 vector jets/propellers, you can build compact, agile drones.
CC programming has a steep learning curve. Subsequent chapters provide preconfigured setups for casual use.
